meanings.definition: Having the ability to produce power or energy.
meanings.sent1: The solar panels were powered by the sun's rays.
meanings.sent2: The wind turbine is powered by the force of the wind.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight was so powered up that it lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm powered her through the challenging task.
meanings.sent5: The engine roared to life, powered by pure determination.

meanings.definition: Operated by a particular type of power source.
meanings.sent1: The electric car is powered by a battery.
meanings.sent2: The computer is powered by electricity.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum cleaner was powered by a tiny motor.
meanings.sent4: The spaceship was powered by advanced alien technology.
meanings.sent5: The entire city was powered by a single hydroelectric dam.

meanings.definition: Energized or activated by a power source.
meanings.sent1: The remote control car is powered by batteries.
meanings.sent2: The smartwatch is powered by a rechargeable battery.
meanings.sent3: The toy robot was powered by a remote control.
meanings.sent4: The emergency lights were powered by a backup generator.
meanings.sent5: The entire building was powered by a solar panel system.
